Package sample.Controller

Class AddAppointmentController

java.lang.Object
sample.Controller.AddAppointmentController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class AddAppointmentController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
The AddAppointmentController class. Provides control logic to the AddAppointment menu to allow new appointments to be added using user input from text fields, combo boxes, and a date picker.

    • onActionCancelBtn

      void onActionCancelBtn(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      On action event for the cancel button. Returns user to appointments menu.
      Parameters:
      event -
      Throws:
      IOException

    • onActionSaveBtn

      void onActionSaveBtn(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException, SQLException
      On action event for save button. Takes user inputted data from text fields, combo boxes, and a date picker to create a new appointment object. Calls an appointment database access function to check if there are any overlapping appointments. Verifies if the user inputted start time is before the end time. Calls appointment database access method to add the appointment to the database. Returns user to appointment menu when complete.
      Parameters:
      event -
      Throws:
      IOException
      SQLException

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Initializes the controller. Populates the combo boxes using database access methods and the time utility class for the appointment times.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url -
      resourceBundle -
